author: Guli
text: There's no such things as getting your hopes up if you're anxious. Little victories are everything in a world where worst-case scenarios are on an endless loop in your head.

author: Guli
text: Show me how good it can get.

author: Guli
text:
World, you're not alone in all this
You're not alone, I promise
Standing together we can do anything

author: Guli
text: Take care of your existence, your worth, your smiles.

author: Guli
text: What is a thing that gives you hope when you think tomorrow?

author: Guli
text:
I'm gonna live like tomorrow doesn't exist
Like it doesn't exist

author: Guli
text:
And I know you should take yourself
Feel the rhythm life goes on again
Though I ain't sure it's really how we meant
I'll feel settled in a simple sense
As I think of you
Less and less

author: Guli
text:
Living in this big blue world
With my head up in outer space
I know I'll be a-o-k

author: Guli
text:
'cause if we just smile
we can forget all of our troubles for a while

author: Guli
text: Oh, I will hold on to the afterglow

author: Guli
text:
We were love drunk, waiting on a miracle
Tryna find ourselves in the winter snow
So alone in love like the world had disappeared
Oh, I won't be silent and I won't let go
I will hold on tighter 'til the afterglow
And we'll burn so bright 'til the darkness softly clears

author: Guli
text:
One more cup of coffee for the road
One more cup of coffee before I go
To the valley below

author: Guli
text:
I am happier than ever
Wish i could explain it better

author: Guli
text:
So be the young, the brave, the powerful
'Cause the world is standing waiting for someone to come and change it
